title: Trump Signs TikTok Order With US App Valued at $14 Billion
description: President Donald Trump advanced plans for American investors to buy TikTok’s US operations from its Chinese owner ByteDance Ltd., with officials setting a potential value of $14 billion and outlining measures to ensure security of the new venture.

title: Google-Linked Crypto Miner Plans $3 Billion Debt for Data Center
description: TeraWulf Inc. is expected to raise approximately $3 billion to support the build-out of its data centers via a structure supported by Google Inc., according to Patrick Fleury, the crypto miner’s finance chief.

title: Why Apple Still Hasn’t Cracked AI
description: The company has long been the king of consumer gadgets. Bloomberg Originals shows how its shortcomings in artificial intelligence could put that at risk.
